OverviewÂ¶

We present two numerical algorithm aimed at high performance computing of Hankel transforms of Transverse Momentum Distributions from the Collins-Soper-Sterman (CSS) \(b_\perp\) space to transverse momentum \(q_\perp\). Specifically, the integration is optimized for integrations of the form

\[\begin{align} W_\nu(q_\perp;\vec{\alpha}) = \int_0^{\infty} \frac{db_\perp}{2\pi} b_\perp^{\nu+1} \widetilde{W}(b_\perp,\vec{\alpha}) J_\nu(b_\perp q_\perp). \end{align}\]

Where \(\vec{\alpha}\) contains other parameters.
